ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No, today they come in absolute submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will submit to questioning then,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed, today they are surrendering themselves completely.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, on that day they will be submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact this day they have all surrendered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, but that Day they shall surrender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! on that day they shall be submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; but today they resign themselves in submission
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but this day they make full submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: indeed, on that Day they will surrender themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nay! on that Day they will be entirely submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, but that day they shall submit (to Judgment);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, but that Day they shall surrender,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, today they will resign themselves in submission,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, on that Day, they will be submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they, that Day, are in surrender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:26] Nay, but today they offer complete submission, [they are] compliant, abased.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but this day) which is the Day of Judgement (they make full submission) the worshipper and the worshipped submitted to Allah and knew that the Truth is with Allah.
